name: EmberCLT
body:
## What is Ember.js?

[Ember.js](http://emberjs.com/) is a JavaScript framework for efficiently creating ambitious web applications.  

## Learn More

* [Ember.js Homepage](http://emberjs.com/)
* [Ember.js Guides](http://emberjs.com/guides/)
* [Ember.js Presentations](https://speakerdeck.com/search?q=ember)
